trans-unit.target: TEXT_REGNOR4THEONDOCUPS_00604_GHOLSHSAATH_000_000<tab>Greetings, honored guessst. How may I be of ssservice?

TEXT_REGNOR4THEONDOCUPS_00604_GHOLSHSAATH_000_010<tab>I am a keeper of tales. Much was lossst in the Flood, and so this duty is more important than ever. How else are the younglings to learn from our mistakesss and build a better world?
TEXT_REGNOR4THEONDOCUPS_00604_GHOLSHSAATH_000_011<tab>Aath must educate the koal, as well as others who have forgotten our hissstory and the wisdom of our forebears.

TEXT_REGNOR4THEONDOCUPS_00604_GHOLSHSAATH_000_020<tab>Long ago we had another home, in the sssouth, until it vanished with the Flood. Those who escaped wandered in sssearch of a new home, until they came to these ruins and claimed them for the Ondo.
TEXT_REGNOR4THEONDOCUPS_00604_GHOLSHSAATH_000_021<tab>The Cupsss, we call them, for the many alcoves into which the wanderers huddled to weather the killing Light. Thus did they sssurvive.
TEXT_REGNOR4THEONDOCUPS_00604_GHOLSHSAATH_000_022<tab>We honor them to this day by pressserving the name and protecting this place. Now and ever after.
TEXT_REGNOR4THEONDOCUPS_00604_GHOLSHSAATH_000_023<tab>Many here may treat you oddly, but it is not out of disssrespect, but unfamiliarity. I pray you do not take offenssse.
TEXT_REGNOR4THEONDOCUPS_00604_GHOLSHSAATH_000_024<tab>That which we lost to the Flood we hope to one day reclaim.

TEXT_REGNOR4THEONDOCUPS_00604_GHOLSHSAATH_000_025<tab>Long did we think this an impossibility, but these are days of change─of ancient sssigns witnessed and prophecies fulfilled. You are an integral part of this, honored guessst. Of change witnessed and change to come...
